Added_Other.name: FFlagMediaPlaybackStopsWhenJoiningExperience_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Stops media playback when a player joins a game.
Added_Other.purpose: Prevents audio or video from playing unexpectedly when entering a new experience.

Added_Other.mechanism: Removes the prompt that asks players to update the game.
Added_Other.purpose: Reduces interruptions for players by not prompting them to update.
